oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Transmission of salmonellae among calves penned individually
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hardman, P. M.
Wathes, C. M.
Wray, C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: routes of transmission
excretion
salmonellae
non-contagious
contagious
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An analysis of the spatial and temporal patterns of excretion of salmonellae by calves penned individually showed that non-contagious routes were more important than contagious routes in disease spread. Full article published in Veterinary Record (1991) 129, 327-329
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1991; 55
